author: lektran
msg: Reformat to separate ftl and html indenting , no functional changes.

author: lektran
msg: Converted all render* methods to use executeMacro(Writer, String, Map) instead of executeMacro(Writer, String).  Removes over 100 lines of StringWriter usage, makes the code easier to read and also fixes the bug that Jacques committed a workaround for in r978893

author: lektran
msg: Changed the parameter map from <String, String> to <String, Object> since some macros use booleans and integers instead of strings.  Changed the method to only wrap strings in double quotes.

author: markt
msg: Add additional tests known to pass - list provided by Marc Guillemot.
